verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Life out of death
Dear master is it spoken
Of the life here,
or in a better land?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Nay, wherefore wait?
The vessel marred and broken
Shall now be molded
by the potters hand

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Life out of death
O wonderous resurrection!
seed sown in conscious
weakness raised in power

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
thy life lived out in
days of toil and friction
"Not I but Christ" in me
from hour to hour

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Life out of death
A pilgrim path and lonely
Trodden by those who
Glory in the cross

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
They live in fellowship with
"Jesus Only"
And for His sake
count earthly gain but loss

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Life out of death
Blessed mission to be ever
Bearing the living
water brimming o'er

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
With life abundant
from the clear pure river
Telling that thirsty souls need
Thirst no more
